ygData.subject: Re: lots of money...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Give it to me and I will give you... a shiney new penny! Save it, your spells at levle 8 cost 4 plat each. -- Silverlock,  ICQ 474725 Household Pests?  The
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:05 PM 6/10/99 EDT, you wrote:
>From: MooMooYou3@...
>
>I, a simple level three enchanter, have come into the posession of a large
>sum of money - around 26 plat. So, I ask you, what should I do with it?
>
Give it to me and I will give you... a shiney new penny!

Save it, your spells at levle 8 cost 4 plat each.
--
Silverlock, ICQ 474725

Household Pests? The SW-404 'SpitFire' APRL cleansing system
will remove them, we Guarantee IT! Not responsible for damage
to persons or structures from use of this product.
Dial 1-800-FRY-THEM for info and a home demonstration.
